item.title: Netflix、週間トップ10ランキングに "再生回数 "を追加（1週間の映画や番組の総視聴時間を上映時間で割って算出）（Rick Porter/The Hollywood Reporter
item.description:
Rick Porter / The Hollywood Reporter:
Netflix tweaks its weekly top 10 rankings to include “views”, calculated by dividing the total time spent watching a film or a show in a week by running time  —  The streamer's weekly rankings will now show the most popular titles by number of accounts watching as well as total time.

item.title: ジャーナリズムが民主主義を救えるかどうかを取り上げるという彼女の新しいポッドキャスト「Substack」について、マーガレット・サリバンとのQ&A（Brian Stelter/Vanity Fair）
item.description:
Brian Stelter / Vanity Fair:
Q&A with Margaret Sullivan about American Crisis, her new Substack podcast that she says will address whether journalism can help save democracy  —  The veteran media writer talked to Vanity Fair about exploring the fallout of Watergate and January 6 for her new Substack show …

item.title: Discord、クリエイターに1回限りの購入で入手可能なデジタル製品「Downloadables」の販売を計画、Media Channelsをベータ展開（Jay Peters/The Verge）
item.description:
Jay Peters / The Verge:
Discord plans to let creators sell “Downloadables”, digital products available via one-time purchases, and rolls out Media Channels in beta  —  Discord plans to give creators a new way to make money from their communities by selling digital products via one-time purchases.

item.title: 情報源: WBDは、収入を増やすため、Issa Raeの2021年のコメディ『Insecure』を含むいくつかのHBOタイトルをNetflixに売却する。
item.description:
Peter White / Deadline:
Sources: in a surprise move, WBD shops some HBO titles to Netflix, including Issa Rae's 2021 comedy Insecure, to boost revenue; some HBO veterans pushed back  —  EXCLUSIVE: HBO's streaming walled garden is coming down, it seems.  —  In a hugely surprising move, Deadline understands …

item.title: ヴィヴェンディのカナル＋、香港のストリーミング配信会社ヴィウの株式26.1％を2億ドルで取得することで合意。
item.description:
Manuel Baigorri / Bloomberg:
Vivendi's Canal+ agrees to acquire a 26.1% stake in Hong Kong-based streamer Viu for $200M; the investment could increase to $300M under certain conditions  —  Canal+, the French broadcaster owned by billionaire Vincent Bollore's Vivendi SE, has agreed to buy a significant minority stake …

item.title: 情報筋によると、YouTubeは6月30日、韓国初のライブコマース用公式ショッピングチャンネルを開設し、約30ブランドのコンテンツを提供する計画だ（聯合ニュース）。
item.description:
Yonhap News Agency:
Sources say YouTube plans to launch its first official shopping channel for live commerce in South Korea on June 30 with content from about 30 brands  —  YouTube will launch its official shopping channel in South Korea for live commerce later this month for the first time in the world, people familiar with the matter said Wednesday.

item.title: [スレッド】最高裁判事のサミュエル・アリトが、声明を出す代わりにウォール・ストリート・ジャーナルの論説でプロパブリカからの質問に答える（Lawrence Hurley/@lawrencehurley）
item.description:
Lawrence Hurley / @lawrencehurley:
[Thread] Supreme Court Justice Samuel Alito uses a Wall Street Journal op-ed to respond to questions from ProPublica, instead of simply issuing a statement  —  Justice Alito appears to be trying to get out ahead of a new ProPublica report that will address a trip he went on with billionaire hedge fund manager Paul Singer. Weirdly, it is published as an opinion piece in the Wall Street Journal: https://www.wsj.com/...

item.title: Smoshの共同創設者アンソニー・パディラとイアン・ヘコックス、18年前に立ち上げたYouTubeブランドの株式の過半数をレット＆リンクのMythicalから買い戻す（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Smosh co-founders Anthony Padilla and Ian Hecox buy back a majority stake in the YouTube brand they launched 18 years ago, from Rhett & Link's Mythical  —  The duo have reunited as onscreen comedy partners and offscreen business associates to acquire a majority ownership stake in Smosh …

item.title: ジョージタウン大学アメリカ研究所がスペイン語ニュースポッドキャスト「Y Esto No Es Todo」を開始、スペイン語ポッドキャスト「El Washington Post」の元ホストを起用（Hanaa' Tameez/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Hanaa' Tameez / Nieman Lab:
Georgetown Americas Institute launches Spanish-language news podcast Y Esto No Es Todo, with the former host of Spanish-language podcast El Washington Post  —  “One of our objectives is to make Georgetown more visible in Latin America...the podcast is a perfect fit to achieve that mission.”

item.title: WBDが国内ケーブルグループのレイオフを開始、DiscoveryとTurnerの店舗で～100人に影響、今夏には他部門でもさらなる削減が予想される（Cynthia Littleton/Variety）
item.description:
Cynthia Littleton / Variety:
WBD begins layoffs in its domestic cable group, affecting ~100 people across Discovery and Turner outlets; more cuts are expected in other divisions this summer  —  Amid the shuffle, TCM general manager Pola Changnon is leaving the classic movie channel after more than 25 years with TCM and Turner.

item.title: キャンドル・メディアがTikTokと提携、まずはリース・ウィザースプーンのブランド「ハロー・サンシャイン」に焦点を当て、#BookTokから著者や文学的素材を発掘・採掘（マックス・ゴールドバート／Deadline紙）
item.description:
Max Goldbart / Deadline:
Candle Media partners with TikTok, initially focusing on Reese Witherspoon's Hello Sunshine brand to find and mine authors and literary material from #BookTok  —  Kevin Mayer and Tom Staggs' Candle Media has struck a partnership with TikTok, with an initial focus on Reese Witherspoon's Hello Sunshine …

item.title: iHeartMediaのTriton Digitalがプログラマティック広告を専門とするパリのアド・インテリジェンス・プラットフォームManadgeを買収（Radio World）
item.description:
Radio World:
iHeartMedia's Triton Digital acquires Paris-based ad intelligence platform Manadge, which specializes in programmatic advertising  —  Triton Digital has acquired advertising intelligence platform Manadge, a Paris-based company that specializes in programmatic advertising.

item.title: 情報筋Glee』『アメリカン・ホラー・ストーリー』のクリエイター、ライアン・マーフィーがNetflixを退社し、ディズニーに移籍する計画。マーフィーは2018年、～3億ドルと報じられた金額でNetflixに入社（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
Sources: Ryan Murphy, the creator of Glee and American Horror Story, plans to leave Netflix for Disney; Murphy joined Netflix in 2018 for a reported ~$300M  —  Superstar TV show creator Ryan Murphy is planning to leave Netflix Inc. for Walt Disney Co., where he would be reunited with the executives …

item.title: ソースラテン系デジタルメディア大手NGLmitúを傘下に持つ非公開持株グループGoDigitalが、倒産したVice Mediaの買収に$300M-$350Mの入札を行う予定（Axios）。
item.description:
Axios:
Source: GoDigital, a private holding group that owns Latino digital media giant NGLmitú, plans to submit a $300M-$350M bid to buy Vice Media out of bankruptcy  —  - GoDigital's plan for Vice Media includes bringing it to profitability within 12 months, a source said.

item.title: 英国のジャーナリストの91％が大卒という調査結果を受け、FTとトータスがジャーナリスト以外の人材育成とニュースルームの多様化を図るプログラムを紹介（Jacob Granger/Journalism.co.uk）
item.description:
Jacob Granger / Journalism.co.uk:
A look at programs by FT and Tortoise to train non-journalists and diversify their newsrooms, as a survey shows 91% of UK journalists hold a university degree  —  With more than 90 per cent of university-educated journalists, the UK media needs to hire from beyond the pool of graduates …
